and <footer_id>)

-- AS400 Message (Batch)

-- If there is no row in CLIENT_COUNTRY with DEBH_HADR_COUNTRY we have to used
-- GNRL_HOFF_CODE
check if PAYD_USRID is a web user (table CUSR)
.. uses in BXA009A and BXA009PS - 3. Paid amount
-- User details
-- Switch system language to client/debtor language
-- Prepare value for <footer_id>, could be changed with HOFF_FOOTER_ADMNO
if > 0

.. exception of GNRL_CODE = NL and CLNT203_OFFICE = 'ES'

will be calculated in task "Obtain PAYMENT_DIFFERENCES")

a currency, is normally set in pervious part where the outstanding invoices
are written to XML
-- Write payment handling letters / specification

-- Copy of final XML File failed
-- PC Message (Online)

-- Only if FinalFile was copied to TaminoQueue by UFB523
-- Switch back to user language
-- build filenames for temporary XML Files
... get sequence number to make temp XML files unique
.. uses diff. footer ID from HUSR if > 0
-- If no PAYD rows exists create a new one, which is used to store REPA
-- If there no journal number exists in PAYD, create a new one
... and also a new row has to be stored to REPA
-- If there already exists a journal number in PAYD, use this number to obtain
-- REPA (f.i. --> the XML archive is already updated and no new REPA row has to
-- be created)

SQL_STMT_U.val: select cast(sum(BPIV_AMOUNTCURRPAY) as decimal(13,2)), cast(sum(BPIV_AMOUNTCURRC) as decimal(13,2)) from :1/bpiv where BPIV_BTCH_ID = :2 and BPIV_BTCP_LINENO = :3 and :4 and (BPIV_PAYMENTCODE = :5 or BPIV_PAYMENTCODE = :6) and BPIV_PAYMENTCODE > 0 for fetch only

Text.val: -- If PAYD_REPA_JOURNALNO already exists, then we don't have to store a new REPA
in this case we use this journal number
-- Store dunning history in case of GSET_YESNO = YES (GSET_ID=122)
(new since 27.01.2006 SH SCR10225)
-- Prepare <cashreport_number>
-- Retreive email address of payent department
... if not exists, retreive email address of incasso department
.. if email address is still empty use email from debtor
-- Set other BXA900 parameters if an email address is determined
in the xml one of the fields is a string with all the invoices numbers
so the string is build here before we write the xml
-- In case of GNRL_ARCHIVEMETHOD = 4 (radient archive)

SQL_STMT_U.val: SELECT INVO_DEBC_NO, INVO_INVOICENO, INVO_INVDATE, INVO_DUEDATE, INVO_CURRENCY, INVO_AACTUALI FROM :1/INVO WHERE INVO_DEBC_NO = :2 :3 ORDER BY INVO_DEBC_NO, INVO_INVOICENO FOR FETCH ONLY OPTIMIZE FOR 100 ROWS
SELECT INVO_CURRENCY, CAST(SUM(INVO_AACTUALI) AS DECIMAL(18,2)) FROM :1/invo WHERE INVO_DEBC_NO=:2 :3 GROUP BY INVO_CURRENCY FOR FETCH ONLY OPTIMIZE FOR 100 ROWS

Text.val: -- Uses to print the <bank> part

MERGE_PARM.PIC_U: U4 U4 U4 U4 U4 U4 U4 U4 U2

for BXA009PS has to be generated

... write totals of normal invoices to XML
-- Differences to XML

-- Paid amount to XML
-- Paymant difference to XML

... invoice type > 1
-- first a blank segment has to be written to XML
